content.question: Blocks <math alttext="K" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="L" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> are initially at rest on a horizontal surface of negligible friction. skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
